thread.title: A "Super Dog" Has Been Called In To Be A Dad To Three Abandoned Tiger Cubs
thread.title_full: A "Super Dog" Has Been Called In To Be A Dad To Three Abandoned Tiger Cubs

author: Jason Wells
title: A "Super Dog" Has Been Called In To Be A Dad To Three Abandoned Tiger Cubs
text:
View this image › 
Cincinnati Zoo & Botanical Garden ID: 10681945 2. This isn’t the first time Blakely, described as a 6-year-old “super dog,” has been called into action for orphaned babies at the zoo, having filled the parental void for cheetahs, an ocelot, a takin, wallabies, skunks, bat-eared foxes, and even a warthog. Blakely licks a cheetah cub in the nursery in 2016. Dale, a month-old baby Takin, plays in its enclosure alongside Blakely in 2015. John Minchillo / AP ID: 10681983 3. Now, Blakely has been called upon once again for the tiger cubs, all of them female, the zoo announced Friday. View this image › 
Cincinnati Zoo / Via youtube.com ID: 10682013 4. Of course, Blakely is more than just a ~cool dad~. He’s also there to teach the young cubs etiquette and the difference between a play bite and one that means “watch out.” View this image › 
youtube.com ID: 10682030 5. “Just a little time with him at this early age will help them learn behaviors that will come in handy when they meet tigers at other zoos in the future,” Dawn Strasser, head of Cincinnati Zoo’s nursery staff, said in a statement. ID: 10682037 6. Godspeed, Blakely’s tail. View this image › 
youtube.com ID: 10682041 7.
